rows.label: tlk70000077_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I just got notice from the Superbian
army.

rows.label: tlk70000077_05_msg0002
rows.name:
The Iiran Divine Beast has awakened 
and shown its true form...

rows.label: tlk70000077_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Wonder how we should deal with
that one... I'll be honest, it beats me...

rows.label: tlk70000077_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Maybe they thought they could take
care of it by installing a machine
on the Divine Beast or something.

rows.label: tlk70000077_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Anyway, I'm convinced that what
I do for a living is still the right thing
for humans and Divine Beasts.

rows.label: tlk70000077_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Please, for the sake of everyone
living there...
